body.description: Whether you�re traveling, running errands, attending personal appointments or doing other activities where face coverings are needed, reach for 3M Daily Use Masks. By wearing a mask that�s adjustable to your face and comfortable, you are doing your part to show you care for those around you. These reusable masks are constructed of 2 layers of cotton fabric and cover the face evenly and completely. Soft, adjustable elastic loops maximize comfort. The 3M Daily Use Masks are washable and come in a resealable pouch that can be used to store your mask when not in use. These masks are not intended for medical use and do not eliminate the risk of contracting any disease or infection. If you have health conditions such as asthma, heart conditions or respiratory conditions, you must consult your health care provider before use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3M Daily Face Masks Whether you’re traveling, running errands, attending personal appointments or doing other activities where face coverings are needed, reach for 3M Daily Face Masks. By wearing a mask that’s adjustable to your face and comfortable, you are doing your part to show you care for your community's well-being. These reusable masks are constructed of two layers of cotton fabric and cover the face evenly and completely. Soft, adjustable elastic loops maximize comfort. The 3M Daily Face Masks are washable and come in a resealable pouch that can be used to store your mask when not in use. These masks are not intended for medical use and do not eliminate the risk of contracting any disease or infection. If you have health conditions such as asthma, heart conditions or respiratory conditions, you must consult your health care provider before use.

Features Two layers of lightweight cotton fabric for breathability and comfortAdjustable, soft elastic ear loops allow for maximum comfortBendable nose piece allows you to adjust mask to rest snugly against nose and faceWashable and reusableIdeal for everyday use, both indoors and outGreat for travel, public transportation, shopping and office settingsAvailable in a 3 pack, 5 pack and 10 packSold in resealable pouch that can be used for storing masks when not in useNot a respirator

How to Wear Step 1 Wash your hands before putting them ask on. Handling the loops, check the condition of the mask. If visibly damaged, discard the mask. Step 2 3M logo should face up and be on the outside of the mask. Put loops around your ears. Step 3 Use both hands to bend metal noseclip to rest snugly against your nose and face. Step 4 Pull the mask under your chin and ensure the mask is snug against your face.

Frequently Asked Questions Q: How do I clean my 3M Daily Face Mask?A: The recommended method for cleaning your daily use mask is to hand wash vigorously with soap and warm water for at least 5 minutes. Rinse and let air dry.Q: Can I clean my 3M Daily Face Mask in the washing machine?A: To maintain the integrity of your reusable mask and avoid possible damage, it is recommended that you avoid machine washing and wash by hand only.Q: How often should I clean my non-medical reusable mask?A: It’s important to clean your reusable mask daily after use. The multi-pack options allow you to have a back-up mask available for use while cleaning the other.Q: Where should I store my non-medical reusable mask?A: The 3M Daily Face Masks come in a resealable pouch providing the ideal place to store your clean and dry masks when not in use. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it, very sleek and lightweight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I want to love it, and sort of do ???
reviews.reviewText: As everyone has said this mask runs small. It's unusual for me to even comment about small because I have a tiny head. Full grown woman, 5'8", 120 lbs, and I wear a Youth size 7-8 baseball hat. See? Tiny head. All my other masks are very large on me, and by that I mean they cover a lot of my face, basically showing just ears and eyes, and I'm not kidding. These masks probably fit me the way they are supposed to, but they seem really small compared to my other masks because my others are so big. They adjust well to my face. I find after washing them I have to tug on the nose and chin sections to make sure they open up all the way. The fabric is thick and if I adjust them properly there are no gap areas around my face. All in all, I really want to love these, but I don't. 3M, make the center portion of these masks larger. The nose and chin are fine!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, great fit, cool style
reviews.reviewText: This mask is really comfortable! I think it looks super cool, and am very happy with my purchase. I really like the design, it is able to be folded and put in your pocket, but I like that it folds to protect the area that touches your face. This is the only mask that I have worn without ripping it off my face as soon as I get in the car.My only complaints is that it is dual layered - which makes it harder to breathe, and I don't believe it makes it any safer. And that it doesn't look as cool as the picture after wearing it and washing it. But it's still able to let me breathe fine, and still cooler looking/better fitting than any other mask I have used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really small, probably best for children
reviews.reviewText: These are sturdy and thick, not the most comfortable and I actually ended up not ever using these since I felt they were too small for my face. (And I don't have a big face, which is why I ordered them anyhow after seeing that others posted they were small) For children under 10 these would probably work great. Not sure for most adults though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The fabric around the nose and chin provide no protective coverage at all. The materials that cover the mouth would only be effective if it was large enough to reach above the nose and below the chin. The packaging was not sealed when taken out of shipping wrap. Even trying to flex the portion of moldable material around the nose is difficult, and unsuccessful no matter how much effort is put in. Poorly designed. Thoughtless product marketed without valid use. Waste of resources.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Secure and comfortable fit
reviews.reviewText: These masks wash well. Have a secure and comfortable fit. They feel protective and breathable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Mask are much smaller than pictured
reviews.reviewText: The mask are good quality and seem to be durable and have a good nose wire to make sure they stay in place. However, the mask are incredibly small on the face and therefore do not fully cover the nose and mouth while allowing for any talking or movement of the jaw. Wanted to like them and I have an average size face but the mask run much smaller than pictured just FYI otherwise I would love them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These masks fit your face very well. The nose clip is very strong and does not wear out. The material is thick, yet very breathable and comfortable. The ear-loops are ajustable, and can be fit accordingly. Definitely try these!

Leí otras publicaciones, y decían que estaban muy chicos y es verdad no soy de cara amplia o cachetón pero incluso así, si se sienten muy justos, la calidad del material es muy buena nada que objetar. Hay un problema de diseño en la parte de la barbilla y del puente de la nariz, tienden a esconderse doblarse para adentro y tienes que estar acomodando frecuentemente el cubrebocas, una pregunta frecuente es si tienen "fierrito" para ajustar a la nariz y sí, si lo tienen y se siente de muy buena calidad. Por último el ajuste de las orejas es muy bueno pero si no lo ajustas bien llega a calar y duele bastante no recomiendo que se use muy apretado se pueden lastimar el oído con el ajustador.
I like this style of mask. My glasses are less likely to fog up. These are poly fabric so they do get hot, but that's masks for you. They fit my smallish face well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: A brand you can rely on.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Honestly once I opened the packaging I thought to myself “Hey.. this looks cool” I later tried it on and found it to be rather tight and not well fitted.I later stretched it out a little and now it literally fits so snuggly and perfect. I have just the right amount of air coming in and out of the mask.I wear glasses so the idea of it constantly getting steamed up is a concern, not with this product. Its deals with air circulation very well.I understand you need to be patient when wearing the mask for the first time (after wash also) Its a good mask and it looks very professional also.

Availability of masks are not an issue these days, but this particular mask feels like it can stand the test of time. Feels very sturdy for a mask, and has a good coverage on the face, including the chin which is uncommon for masks.Only issue with it is that if you sweat easily, the part where it rests on the bridge of the nose will darken due to sweat. So for my use, it darkens often.

reviews.reviewTitle: Size is a bit small if you have a “large” head
reviews.reviewText: It’s quite nicely constructed, definitely a product that 3m is willing to put their stamp of approval upon. Sizing is a bit small, the rfm100-3 or MCOE7 that I received is smaller than the blue “dentist” healthcare style face mask that I’ve been wearing underneath my other cloth masks.As a former tradesperson used to masking up even before it was a thing, I would say that the 3m actually isn’t too difficult to breathe through but it may feel foreign for first-timers.It’s more than likely UNDER a 80-90% particle rating so depending on your intent, caveat emptor or double up with a disposable (rated) maskIt folds up to the size of a deck of cards so, that could be a useful feature.
